es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow
Class SynchronizationFlow

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.SimulationObject
      es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.BasicFlow
          es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.SingleSuccessorFlow
              es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.MergeFlow
                  es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.ANDJoinFlow
                      es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.SynchronizationFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
ANDJoinFlow, FinalizerFlow, Flow, JoinFlow, MergeFlow, SingleSuccessorFlow, SynchronizationFlow, Identifiable, SimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
public class SynchronizationFlow
extends ANDJoinFlow
implements SynchronizationFlow

An AND join flow which passes only when all the incoming branches have been activated once. It is reset when all the incoming branches are activated exactly once (both true and false). Meets the Synchronization pattern (WFP3).

Author:
ycallero
